title: Transfering
body:
Guys and girls i just wanted to ask if I am platinum 4 on the EUNE server and then I transfer to north america how much lower im i going to get if my MMR is a normal platinum 4 MMR on EUNE?And if someone owns my name do i have to pay more to change it or i can change it for free(except the 2600 rp of transfering)
                                                                                                         Greetings Summoners!

replies.body: Each region has their own skillsets and MMR, so I couldn't guarantee where you would place.  If your summoner name is already taken on a destination region, you will be prompted to select a new name without additional cost.  I hope that clears things up, and good luck!
Thanks a lot bro!But i mean like i will get much lower like 5 divisions down if i win the 1 game(plat 4 going to gold 4) or i can get much lower if i lose it too(i mean bronze)!
